What are the major steps that can be taken by the Indian government to make the country safe for women? Elaborate…
    India is a country, where the security of women is seen lacking.In present ages we can find many ladies working in various fields either it can be in the morning shift or in the night shift.So coming to the part of protection Indian Government must and should provide safe life to women.

    Firstly considering the issue while travelling in outside vehicles such as Auto-rikshaw, cab, taxi, bus should be under survilliance of government. The details of the driver should be mentioned on the name board along with phone numbers.Help-line numbers must be given on the board. Pepper spray should be made available in any medical or departmental stores at affordable price.Patrols have to move on the streets to check the status of security of everyone.Separate lady's buses should be provided in more count. 

    Secondly at the work place.The woman should be guarded by the guard member. Any complaint rised should be immediatly taken into action and respective charge is given.

    Thirdly at colleges. Anti-ragging force must be in presence  to see the security of girls from senior students.The culprit must be prisoned or given respective fine in such a way that it can never be repeated in future.

    Last but not the least thing is, whenever a girl files a case regarding any threatens or self protection , it is the duty of the Police person to come in action and catch the culprit but not to go in support of the culprit and join him in his mischieves.Serious lawful acts should come into form.
